screen:
-= Info about function 'DB_EXISTS' =-
[Syntax] DB_EXISTS(<family>/<key>)
[Synopsis] Check to see if a key exists in the Asterisk database
[Description] This function will check to see if a key exists in the Asterisk database. If it exists, the function will return "1". If not, it will return "0". Checking for existence of a database key will also set the variable DB_RESULT to the key's value if it exists.
